ualberta.cmput301w16t16.glamorousborrowingwhaleapp

Class BidList

  • java.lang.Object
    • ualberta.cmput301w16t16.glamorousborrowingwhaleapp.BidList

  • public class BidList
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Martina on 16-02-29. This class contains a few functions for a list of bids to make it easier to control that list. BidList is called in many functions (mostly the same as the ones that call Bid)
    Author:
    Adam, Andrew, Erin, Laura, Martina
    See Also:
    Bid, IncomingBidsActivity, ViewBorrowingOutActivity, MyBidsActivity, MakeBidActivity, ElasticSearch, CustomIncomingBidsAdapter, BidController
